name: CricketScoreNotifier
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cricket score notifier
des:
Are you a cricket fan? Here is an Alexa skill just made for you. Now you can ask Alexa cricket scores for your favorite cricket team. If no matches are live for the requested team, Alexa notifies the same otherwise lets you know the scoreboard.

Usage:
1) Ask Alexa to open "Cricket Score Notifier"
2) Tell the name of your favorite team or the team you want to know the score for.
3) That's it...Just wait till Alexa gets the scores for you.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
